history.proof: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4. apply chain_ind. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: chain_concat_s, chain_concat_m, chain_single. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: chain_concat_s, chain_concat_m, chain_single. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: chain_concat_s, chain_concat_m, chain_single. - srun best use: iteres_dom_ok, pre_domok_incr_chain, iteres_incr.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n : nat H1 : T x H2 : def_ok_app A T f H3 : increasing_app A r f H4 : r x (f x) Unable to unify "T x" with "chain A T r (iteres A f x n)".

original: intros A T r f x n H1 H2 H3 H4. apply chain_ind. - intros x H. apply chain_single. apply H. - intros x y H5 H6 H7. apply chain_concat_s. + apply H5. + apply H6. + apply H7. - intros x y z H5 H6 H7 H8 H9. apply chain_concat_m. + apply H5. + apply H6. + apply H8. + apply H9. - apply H1.
